references.text: You number my wanderings; Put my tears into your bottle; Are they not in your book?
And one of them when he saw that he was healed, turned back, and with a loud voice glorified God, and fell down on his face at his feet, giving him thanks; and he was a Samaritan
Praise ye the Lord, O give thanks unto the Lord; for he is good; for his mercy endureth forever

To appoint unto them that mourn in Zion, to give unto them beauty for ashes, the oil of joy for mourning, the government of praise for the spirit of heaviness; that they might be called trees of righteousness, the planing of the LORD, that he might be glorified

title: Feel burdened and in need of rest

references.text: Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest. Take my yoke upon you and learn from me, for I am gentle and humble in heart, and you will find rest for your souls. For my toke is easy and my burden is light

title: Are tempted but, when you don't want to sin against God

references.text: How can a young man cleanse his way? By taking heed according to your word. With my whole heart I have sought You; oh, let me not wander from your commandments! Your word I have hidden in my heart, that I might not sin against You!
But the very hairs of your head are all numbered

And why take ye thought for raiment? Consider the lilies of the field, how they grow; they toil not, neighter do they spin; And yet I say unto you, that even Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these

And why take ye thought for raiment? Consider the lilies of the field, how they grow; they toil not, neighter do they spin; And yet I say unto you, that even Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these. Wherefore, if God so clothe the grass of the field, which today is, and tomorrow is cast into the oven, shall he not much more clothe ye, O ye of little faith? There take no thought, saying, What shall we eat? or, What shall we drink? Or, Wherewithal shall we be clothed? (For after all these things do the Gentiles seek:) for your heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things. But seek ye first the Kingdom of God, and his righteousness; and all these things shall be added unto you. Take therefore no thought for the morrow: for the morrow shall take thought for the things of itself. Sufficient unto the day is the evil thereof.
Let your hope keep you joyful, be patient in your troubles and pray at all times.

title: Need to do something that's God's will/calling but aren't interested in doing so

references.text: Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith who for the joy that was set before Him endured the cross, despising the shame, and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God

title: Are worried about any work that you need to do

references.text: Now the God peace, that brought again from the dead our Lord Jesus, that great shephered of the sheep, through the blood of the everlasting covenant. Make you perfect in every good work to do his will, working in you that which is well pleasing in his sight, through Jesis Christ; to whom be glory for ever and ever, Amen.

Instead, "If your enemies are hungry, teed them. If they are thirsty, give them something to drink. In doing this, you will heap burning coals of shame on their heads." Don't eveil conquer you, but conquer evil by doing good.
But when I am afraid, I will put my trust in you. I praise God for what he has promised.

title: Feel like God doesn't care about you and you prospering in life

references.text: Let them shout for joy, and be glad, that favour my righteous cause: yea, let them say continually, let the Lord be magnified, which hath pleasure in the prosperity of his servant and my tongue shall speak of thy righteousness and of thy praise all the day long.
The one who calls you is faithful, and he will do it.
The LORD is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart; and saveth such as be of a contrite spirit. Many are the afflictions of the righteousness: but the Lord delivereth him out of them all.

title: Think GOD isn't working according to your plan

references.text: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are then called according to his purpose
Great favor rests upon you, for you have believed every word spoken to you from the LORD
